recommendations.title: Mechanical Engineering Staff
responsibilities: Perform a full lifecycle product development (design, develop, test prototypes, manufacture and implement)
Analyze design systems and components based on needs and requirements
Conduct experiment and machine trial methodically, analyze data and interpret the result
Test and evaluate theoretical machine design
Identify, formulate and produce effective solution to emerging problem
Evaluate final machineâ€™s overall performance, reliability and safety
Ensure the machine to meet the requirements and to eliminate the malfunctions
Estimate budget and scope of project
Solicit observation from operator
Prepare machine reports and documentation
requirements: Min. university degree majoring in Mechanical Engineering (or related field)
Have strong capability in the Mechanical Engineering (mechanical component and technical support)
Able to study and repair the machine with high specification
Good communication skills, both written and oral (in English)
Have a good knowledge of current internationally recognized Codes and Standards
Have awareness of Health, Safety & Work Environment culture as a top priority
Willing to be placed at Serpong (and mobile depends on project's need)

recommendations.title: Electrical Engineer
responsibilities: Design and review electrical systems for industrial and energy projects
Prepare technical drawings, specifications, and load calculation
Supervise installation and testing of electrical equipment
Ensure compliance with safety standards and regulations
Coordinate with project and site teams to ensure timely execution
Support commissioning and troubleshooting activities

recommendations.title: Architectural Product Design, Research, & Development
responsibilities: Conduct in-depth research on materials, technology, and construction methods to improve production efficiency
Develop and test product prototypes before implementation in production
Identify weaknesses and opportunities for improvement in products under development
Evaluate the effectiveness of materials, designs, and production methods based on data and testing
Provide technical recommendations to the operations and engineering teams regarding product development results
Coordinate with vendors and suppliers for material testing and procurement of new raw materials
Develop work standards, procedures, and technical specifications that can be widely implemented
Prepare comprehensive documentation related to research results, testing, and product evaluations
Create innovative solutions to optimize production processes and product quality
requirements: A minimum of 4 years of experience in the construction industry; a degree in Architecture or Civil Engineering, specifically in research and product development within the construction or manufacturing industry
Able to develop and test new materials, methods, and technologies to enhance production efficiency
Proficient in R&D-related software, such as CAD, BIM, or engineering simulation software
